writer.name: 尼古拉斯·赫尔佐格 Nicolás Herzog

director.name: 尼古拉斯·赫尔佐格 Nicolás Herzog

this_title: Vuelo nocturno: La leyenda de las princesitas argentinas
trans_title: 夜间飞行：阿根廷公主的传说
introduction: A series of recordings that Antoine de Saint-Exupéry sent to the filmmaker Jean Renoir during 1941 are the starting point to reconstruct the love story that united the French writer and aviator with the Argentine "princesses" Edda and Suzzane Fuchs, protagonists of the Chapter "Oasis" of his book Earth of Men and inspiring of his work summit The Little Prince.
chinese_title: 夜间飞行：阿根廷公主的传说
foreign_title: Vuelo nocturno: La leyenda de las princesitas argentinas
